sentence: please complete the attached form and turn it in by august 1st .

thank you , niserg .
i will really appreciate it if you can ask some other teacher .

we are excited to have a few new staff member to our mission san jose high school family .
please help me in welcoming the following individual : jacqueline goodwin , mohini kaladi , tejinderpal kaur , oana seremeta , kim roderick , bhavika vyas , iris wong ( msjhs class of 2003 ! ) .
we will be holding these on thursday , friday , monday , tuesday , and next thursday during office hour .
each interview will be 10 minute long and we will be asking a few question similar to those on the application .
please sign up for a slot on the attached spreadsheet preferably by tomorrow evening .
feel free to let u know if you have any question or concern !

more detail to follow .
please visit this page to learn next step : http : //foothill.edu/hs/
you will be unable to register for any class until the admission and record office ha reviewed your permission form .

click on 'apps ' , then click on 'student registration ' , and click 'get my date to register ' .
you do not qualify for priority registration .
thank you for choosing foothill college .

student will need the following to join the class from home : ( a ) any computer ( window or apple mac ) ; ( b ) any browser ; ( c ) software needed to write the code ( student are already using this to submit their homework ) .
following are the step student need to complete at least one hour before the first class ( one-time setup ) :
open browser and type the following url : http : //zoom.us/j/28754154942
zoom client exe will be downloaded from the browser .
run this exe to install zoom client .
make sure to complete the audio test when prompted .
you will see a popup with the message - please wait for host to start the meeting .
your setup is now complete .
please join the class 2 minute before the actual class start time .
a popup window will ask to open zoom ? click open zoom button .
on the next popup window , select – join with computer audio .
now you are in the class .
student should send a confirmation email after completing the setup .

thank you for participating .
you 've been selected .
last month you signed up for our research study , but we did n't have space for you .
we 're happy to let you know that you have been selected to participate and now have the opportunity to earn a $ 40 digital gift card .
the activity will take no more than 1 hour and 40 minute ( 100 minute ) .
once completed , you 'll be eligible to receive a $ 40 digital gift card that can be used at a variety of retailer , such a walmart , amazon , starbucks , itunes , target , and dunkin ' donut .
you should complete this activity during your personal ( not school ) time , and you must finish by 11:59 p.m. et , on november 17 .

make sure you 're set up in a quiet , private workspace , where you 'll be free from interruption for an hour , and you 'll have a computer ( desktop , laptop , or chromebook ) and a reliable internet connection .
please make sure your battery is fully charged or you 're plugged into a power source .
there 's limited space in this study , and you wo n't be able to take part if we 've reached our participant limit .
please start a soon a you can .
how to earn your $ 40 digital gift card :
complete the activity in a single session .
if you close before finishing , you ca n't come back , and you 'll forfeit your $ 40 digital gift card .
spend time and make an honest effort on every question .
this opportunity is only for you , so please do n't share this message .
complete about 15 minute of math or reading and writing question to earn up to $ 5 .
if there 's space remaining after you finish the first set , you may be asked to complete another 15 minute of question .
do n't start the activity until you 're ready to begin .
the link below will launch it .
thank you for your previous participation in our practice activity where you earned a gift card for answering reading and writing or math question .
claim code : vt5h-wwxwn3-tsal .
to redeem your gift card visit www.amazon.com/redeem .
if you have question about redeeming your gift card , please visit www.amazon.com/gc-redeem .

you 're invited to attend the first nacac virtual college fair of the season on sunday , august 29 from 1-6 p.m. et !
please sign up for free at virtualcollegefairs.org .
the virtual fair is a great opportunity to connect with college and pursue your college dream .
it 's easy to chat live with college admission representative or drop in on live zoom session offered by hundred of college on a single day .
more than 100,000 student and family signed up this past spring .
go now to virtualcollegefairs.org and start tagging the zoom session you want to attend .
you 'll then get a text reminder before the session start .
we look forward to seeing you on august 29 !
fall 2021 schedule .
attend a many fair a you wish !
click below to see a list of college that will share information about their program , major , financial aid , and more on each fair date .
additional college will be added throughout the fall .
three of these event are smaller fair for student with special interest or residing in specific region : northeastern u ( sep. 28 ) , midwest u ( oct. 14 ) , and the art & stem ( nov. 2 ) .
connect virtually .
covid-19 ha limited the opportunity for you to visit , learn about , and connect with college .
we aim to bridge that gap through these special one-day event .
at each virtual fair , you can attend presentation by college , ask question , and demonstrate interest ... all without leaving home .
watch this short video for how-to information .
be sure to sign up at virtualcollegefairs.org well before each fair date !

playing sport since a young age is primarily responsible for who i am today .
physical activity inspires me today to live a healthy lifestyle by having a gym routine and getting the proper nutrition .
to get good nutrition , i knew i could not keep relying on others to make my food , which led to developing the skill of cooking .
upon entering high school , many student before me had told me about the school ’ s competitive nature , extremely tough class , and academically overdriven student .
in my freshman year , the school atmosphere forced a change in me in which i learned how to relieve stress and have fun with school .
i applied and got selected for a club called inclusion council , where i helped share my knowledge with younger student each kid how to do the same with this knowledge .
this experience will help me ease into the active mind of minnesota , which aim to support mental health struggle around campus .
a i get older , i find an increasing desire to be independent .
one way i approach this goal is on the financial side of life .
i recently started investing and have accumulated knowledge over the past month through friend , family , book , and youtube .
i have also built program to help me on this path .
currently , i am part of the finance committee at next generation nation , where i help with fundraising , finding investor , and working on fundamental growth .
participating in the investment and finance organization would allow me to share my unique experience with finance and learn from other individual a well a professional in this area .
umass application document note
the essay is your work . should you want the essay to be reviewed by anyone , please copy only the essay part , without any comment , and share it through another document .
if the reviewer is a professional ( educational consultant of any type ) , please speak with me before you share it .

the template , and the framework are prepared for you and you are using it under license . please do not copy the entire document or any part of it other than the essay in any form ( print/soft copy/another file/download etc . ) .
this is not an essay . even if you do not need the framework , please go through this exercise - it will be useful .
step 1 : question within the prompt : why do you want to attend ?
step 2 : explain why you think they are asking you to address this prompt : umass amherst want to admit student who are excited about enrolling and can bring something unique to campus .
step 3 : similar essay you have written ( their prompt # ) : wisconsin-1 .
step 4 : your thought ( please make sure you address each question ; bullet point okay , but please be very specific ; provide link to course , department , club and anything you are referring to ) .
professional happiness design ( phd ) document
you have the opportunity to complete a professional happiness design ! this is an opportunity for you to reflect and to build a framework to navigate your career .
you ’ ll start with several prompt for reflection , then synthesize them to tell your story .
provide your final 1-2 page synthesis followed by an appendix of reflection to the prompt .
authentic leadership reading . read discovering your authentic leadership , bill george , harvard business review . what jumped out or resonated with you ?
section 1 : where are you now ? reflect on the below question and write a few sentence responding to each bullet point .
which people and experience in your life have had the greatest impact on you ?
what are your most deeply held value ? where did they come from ?
what inspires and motivates you extrinsically and intrinsically ?
what make you happy and what brings meaning to your life ?
what constitutes professional happiness for you ?
what are your strongest skill and quality ? what are your unique talent ?
section 2 : where do you want to be ? imagine the future with the below prompt and write a few sentence responding to each bullet point .
first , design your perfect day .
imagine a magazine/newspaper column about yourself published 20 year in the future . what publication is it and what doe the column highlight ?

section 3 : what do you need to do to get there ? reflect on the below question , thinking about “ what do you need to do to get from where you are now to where you want to be ? ” write a few sentence responding to each bullet point .
who will be on your personal advisory board ? who are your role model ?
what knowledge , skill , and quality would you like to learn and develop ?
what are your long-term goal ( 5 year , 1 year ) ?
what are your short-term goal ( top 3 for the next quarter ) ?
synthesize your reflection & tell your story .
do not simply copy-paste your reflection question response a your “ synthesis ” a this will likely lead to an auto-decline .
should you want the essay to be reviewed by anyone , please copy only the essay part , without any comment , and share it through another document .
even if you do not need the framework , please go through this exercise - it will be useful .
if you are n't sure what each step mean , please ask .
now identify word and sentence which are absolutely essential to your message ( your message would not come through if you don ’ t have those ) .
you may want to highlight them with your favorite color .
try to cut the word from rest .

sport : disciplined , good at time management , respect for personal health , cooking , independent .
high school : learned to challenge yourself , and at the same time , not let the pressure hurt you . you helped others a well in this area .
finance and investing a a result of desire to be independent .
